summary: eZVim adds some features to vim for eZ Publish CMS
name: eZVim
description:
Features
    * Classes View : a sidebar displaying group classes, classes and attributes of content object classes.
    * Syntax highligthing for eZ Publish templates and ini files
    * Some vim abbreviations for the eZ Publish template syntax.

Requirements
    * vim and python scripting support. Under Debian or Ubuntu, just install the vim-python package.
    * eZ Publish with the eZDevtools extension.

Tested with vim 7.1 under Ubuntu. It should work under any Unix. Not tested with others. 

See project page http://projects.ez.no/ezvim for more.

versions.release_notes: New version with syntax highlithing for eZ Publish templates and ini files.
